name: Repetend
description:
Repetend is a first-person platformer game where you cannot jump, but instead you fall in a world which repeats itself infinitely many times.

Staying in space for five seconds counts as a loss.

A level can be completed by getting to the endpoint and can be mastered by doing so using the minimum possible number of falls.

Includes,

  • 50 levels, more added later
  • Steam Achievements
  • Steam Trading Cards
